attributes.action: Save non league football in Spennymoor as it is being closed down by town council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town council is planning to evit the football club after 103 years at the ground. They have ignored requests to discuss it from local people and have advertised the lease, giving us until the 22nd Aug to vacate. We value a football club in the town but feel that we are being treat with total contempt by the council members.
